--- title: "Mediation and moderation" --- ## Content - Linear mediation model - Moderation ## Learning objectives At the end of the session, students should be capable of - Using the linear mediation model - discussing limitations of the linear mediation model - testing for moderating variables (interactions) ## Readings - Chapter 11 of the [course notes](https://lbelzile.github.io/math80667a/11-causal-inference.html) - Chapter 11 of @Vanderweele:2015 - Linear mediation model [@Baron/Kenny:1986] - Limitations of the linear mediation model approach [@Bullock.Green.Ha:2010] - Model assumptions [@Pearl:2014;@Imai:2010] ## Slides
